name: marketplace-pivot
description: Align product + implementation to the multi-category marketplace PRD (outreach + unified closing layer)

thresholds.description: PRD sliced into 4 child PRDs with traceability and ship order
Slice A defined: buyer workspace + tile detail provenance (FAQ/chat log)
Slice C defined: seller tiles + quote intake producing buyer-visible tiles
Slice D defined: unified closing layer requirements (retail + contract-required)

signals.description: Cross-cutting requirements captured in each slice (auth, monitoring, billing, data, performance, UX/accessibility, privacy)
Dependencies and ship order reflect independent shippability and north star impact
Acceptance criteria are business-testable (binary or quantitative) across all slices

approval.change_reason: Activated DoD with recommended thresholds/signals for marketplace pivot slices
